thread.title: Anirudh to score for Vikram’s film? | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: Anirudh to score for Vikram’s film? | Deccan Chronicle

author: Deccan
title: Anirudh to score for Vikram’s film? | Deccan Chronicle
text: Deccan Chronicle | October 08, 2015, 03.11 am Vikram It was reported earlier that Vikram would team up with Anand Shankar of Arima Nambi fame. Though the shooting of the film was expected to commence in June, the schedule has been delayed due to unknown reasons. According to a source, the film has been tentatively titled Marma Manidhan and will have Kajal Aggarwal and Bindu Madhavi essaying the female leads. The source adds that some crucial scenes from the movie will be shot in Malaysia. The latest is that Anirudh will be roped in to score music for the film. If everything goes well, the young composer will score for a Vikram film for the first time. Meanwhile, Vikram’s 10 Enrathukulla is awaiting theatrical release on October 21. entertainment Kollywood Vikram Anirudh Also Read Watch the making of 'Bajrangi Bhaijaan' teaser Aishwarya, Abhishek and Jaya come out to support Amitabh Bachchan at Padma awards I am not in the race: Charmme Carving out her own niche
